setVerticesAndJoin

public void setVerticesAndJoin(Item otherItemOrStub,
                               Symbol makeConnectionMode,
                               Sequence connectionPositionSequence)
                        throws G2AccessException
Parameters:
otherItemOrStub - either the loose end Connection or Entity to which this Connection should be connected.
makeConnectionMode - either MOVING_LOOSE_END_, JOINING_LOOSE_ENDS_, or MAKING_NEW_JUNCTION_BLOCK_;
connectionPositionSequence - a flattend Sequence of the vertices to be set for this connection.
Throws:
G2AccessException - if there are any communication problems or exceptions within the remote method call
